location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Edward Barnard, Captain of HMS Conway,anchored off the Island of Karack to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing correspondence in relation to an incident in which a Bahraini ship was seized by HC Cruizer Antelopeon 23 August 1818. Three enclosures:1. A copy of a letter from Lieutenant J Arthur, Commander of the HC Cruizer Antelope. It is a statement describing the encounter between his ship and the Bahraini vessel.2. A copy of a letter from George Barnes [...], First Lieutenant of HC Cruizer Antelope, to J Arthur, dated 23 August 1818. It is reporting on the state of the papers from the Bahraini ship.3. List of items taken by HC Cruizer Antelopefrom the Bahraini ship, undated.
